steps_string:
Steps( Begin(), 
Operation(Multiply(), number_in_box(1), number_in_box(9), put_result_into_box(8)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(6), 2), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(6), 2), number_in_box(1)), then_go_to_step(4), then_go_to_step(5)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(1), 1), increase(1)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(1), 1), number_in_box(5)), then_go_to_step(8), then_go_to_step(6)),
Put(number_in_box(7), into_box(2)),
Verify(greater_than(instruction_box_number(step_number(9), 2), number_in_box(3)), then_go_to_step(1), then_go_to_step(5)),
Change_Box_Number(the_instruction_box(step_number(9), 2), increase(1)),
Put(number_in_box(4), into_box(7)), End())
question: What number is now in Box 8?
question_zh: 经过以上操作之后，现在8号盒子中的数字是多少?
desc: Multiply: ( number in box 1 ) * ( number in box 9 ), put result into box 8.
Change Instruction 6: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 6 greater than ( number in box 1 )
Change Instruction 1: Increase the first box number mentioned in it by 1
Is the first box number mentioned in Instruction 1 greater than ( number in box 5 )
Put ( number in box 7 ) into box 2
Is the second box number mentioned in Instruction 9 greater than ( number in box 3 )
Change Instruction 9: Increase the second box number mentioned in it by 1
Put ( number in box 4 ) into box 7
desc_zh: 相乘：1号盒子中的数字*9号盒子中的数字，将结果放在8号盒子中。
更改指令6：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令6中第2个盒子的编号比1号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令1：将该指令中的第1个盒子的编号加1
判断：指令1中第1个盒子的编号比5号盒子中的数字大吗
将7号盒子中的数字放在2号盒子中
判断：指令9中第2个盒子的编号比3号盒子中的数字大吗
更改指令9：将该指令中的第2个盒子的编号加1
将4号盒子中的数字放在7号盒子中
